title: Gracie Hayes
text:
LinkedIn
  
  
    
     Github
  
  
     STEPP Center
  
  
     CV
  

  
  
I am a PhD candidate currently working on projects in Experimental Design and Meta Analysis. My career aspiration is to advance social justice by promoting equitable research methods and fair interpretations of quantitative data. I am currently looking for Summer 2026 internship opportunities.

Education

M.S. in Statistics and Data Science
Northwestern University | March 2024
B.S. in Mathematics & B.A. in Sociology
Wheaton College | May 2022

Bruce Spencer Outstanding Graduate TA or GA Award

Society for Research Synthesis Methods
Society for Research on Educational Effectiveness

Consultant
IES Summer Research Training Institute on Cluster-Randomized Trials | Summers 2023 - 2025
